name: deskai
description: Offline meta-agent that routes user requests to local models and tools

scripts.example:basic: npm run build:backend && npm run build:examples && node dist-examples/basic-usage.js
scripts.example:router: npm run build:backend && npm run build:examples && node dist-examples/router-api.js
scripts.example:learning: npm run build:backend && npm run build:examples && node dist-examples/learning-mode.js
